title: Dear Boards, which ADC dou you want to be meta?
body:
Just this question, because when it was the ardent meta and all the "point and click-no skill" I thought people wanted Ezreal and MF to be meta because EZ dmg is based on skillshots and MF Q double can be avoid by good positioning/ her ultimate can be stopped by cc and she cant move while ulting. 

And I'm fine with Riot nerfing Ez Q dmg because he needed to do less dmg, also the MF nerf on E was fair but for what I read this days on Boards is that you guys don't want either MF or EZ to be meta.
(And if you want my opinion about Vayne I will just tell that she's my every game ban unless I'm MF and Yasuo windwall is open, don't think I defend this champ)

And you don't need to go check my most played champs to know I'm biased:  I'm a ADC main, my most played champs are Cait-MF-Ashe-Ezreal and I can play in a decent way for my elo every adc with 2 exceptions that are Draven and Twicht.

So I ask again: Which adcs would you want to be meta? 
Because I have the feeling that some of you guys just hate the adcs and you will not be happy until they are removed from this game.

I play crit Jhin, shit's fun as hell. TBH though your attack range comment is fairly invalid, besides his spell casts, he has one of the lowest ADC auto ranges in the game, at 550. Quinn, Jinx (Minigun), and Xayah are the only ADC's with a shorter range, and jinx can increase hers with fishbones. He's tied with Corki, Draven, Ezreal, Kalista, Miss Fortune, LV1 Tristana, Twitch and Vayne. He's outranged by Varus, Ashe, Caitlyn, LV2+ Tristana, Jinx (fishbone), Kog'Maw (with W active), and Twitch (with ult). The biggest downside with Jhin is he has no real way to force fights. all you gotta do is bait and poke him, force unfavorable fights (right as he reloads or just after Q, bonus points if he does both), and generally force him to fight on your time. He's unique because his windows of power are huge, but his downtime between is the weakest in the game to compensate. its essentially a .5 second window of opportunity every time he makes an action that you can punish, but any other time YOU will be punished.

I don't mind Jhin outside of lane phase. Literally when I'm pushed in is the only time. Otherwise I love the guy.

> [{quoted}](name=saltran,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=xiJoc6tK,comment-id=00060000,timestamp=2017-12-31T16:50:04.264+0000)

Just boards? You should've seen Reddit, or just about everywhere else outside Boards.

The class as a whole needs to be re-evaluated and its mid-late game burst-per-second concept removed.

*Every time* an ADC has been taken out of botlane (Graves and Kindred jungle, Quinn and Vayne Top, Lucian and Corki Mid) their winrates spiked insanely hard and needed a harsh nerf. This indicates that the ADC class as a whole is busted. They're meant to match each other at about 50% winrate sure, but against other classes in THEIR respective lanes they crush the opposition.

Crit chance needs to be removed from the game and the extra damage output you'd expect from it be integrated with champion kits, much like Ashe is, with the intent of giving windows of power and counterplay to the class beyond 'A-move and pray for the crits'. 

Riot has to choose between ADCs having damage over time, or burst damage. I'm fine with AD casters (Corki, Lucian, MF, Ezreal) doing burst and the more typical ADCs (Jinx, Ashe, Kindred, Vayne) doing damage per second. Not both at once.

If need be, augment their self-defense capacity in exchange for the damage nerf, i don't care. The chainable 800 health crits need to stop.
